name: Purify (itch) (moon works)
description:
Use Purify to quickly and simply cleanse your computer of any ill feelings or bad vibes induced by late-night scary stories, horror movies, photos of people giving you the evil eye, etc.

Concept and graphics are by me, coded in Godot. Font is from Michael Walkden's Pixel Fonts. Sounds are from freesound.org by users dermotte and hypocore.
